Reviews.Title: very satisfied
Reviews.Author: nancy "nancy"
Reviews.Content: I'm happy with the product but i guess i expected a little more on it. I had to load a lot of software on myself. thought it would have more than the very basics.  the laptop itself was fine. works great was delivered quickly and in good condition. I would order from here again.

ProductInfo.Name: Dell Inspiron 1545 15.6-Inch Laptop (Cherry Red), 2.2GHz Intel Pentium Dual Core T4400 CPU; 4GB System Memory; 320GB Hard Drive; DVD/CD±R/RW Optical Drive; Windows 7 Home Premium Operating System (64-bit); 6-cell Battery; High Definition Audio 2.0; 10/100 Ethernet; Wireless 802.11 b/g Card
